mapper.update: update TBL_USER set CHANNEL_ID = #{channelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STORE_ID = #{storeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMP_NAME = #{empName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSTEM_FLAG = #{systemFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISABLED_FLAG = #{disabledFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUTHORITY_GRADE = #{authorityGrade,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, START_DATE = #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, END_DATE = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_EMP_ID = #{updateEmpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_EMP_NAME = #{updateEmpName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where EMP_ID = #{empId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select EMP_ID, CHANNEL_ID, STORE_ID, EMP_NAME, SYSTEM_FLAG, DISABLED_FLAG, AUTHORITY_GRADE, START_DATE, END_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_EMP_ID, UPDATE_EMP_NAME from TBL_USER where EMP_ID = #{empId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select EMP_ID, CHANNEL_ID, STORE_ID, EMP_NAME, SYSTEM_FLAG, DISABLED_FLAG, AUTHORITY_GRADE, START_DATE, END_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_EMP_ID, UPDATE_EMP_NAME from TBL_USER
